body:
Hello All,


If I want to show cumulative results (images), eg lux hrs per year or 
lux hrs per month, what is the right way to do this for the 3 phase with 
dctimestep. So for example with an annual sky matrix generated with 
gendaymtx, do I sum this up somehow and then apply?


Thanks,


-Jack




Jack de Valpine
President


Visarc Incorporated
www.visarc.com


channeling technology for superior design and construction
